name: Need For Speed™: The Run
description: Matt is a marked man. Matt has just found a way to save his life. All he needs to do is win an illicit, coast-to-coast race from San Francisco to New York. It’s called The Run. Three-thousand miles of unforgiving asphalt from San Francisco to New York. No speed limits. No rules. No allies. Armed with just his guts and instinct, Matt battles a field of the most notorious drivers ever assembled. Dense city streets, icy mountain passes and narrow canyons push his driving skills to the limit. Matt is racing for his life.
